lesson_1.Title: Love
lesson_1.Memo:
"Ljubav" is the root of some other words in Croatian language, like:
"Ljubiti" - "To kiss"
"Poljubac" - "A kiss"
"Zaljubljen / Zaljubljena" = "In love"
"Ljubavnik / Ljubavnica" = "Lover"
"Ljubomora" = "Jealousy"
"Voditi ljubav" = "To make love"

lesson_3.Title: Asking for a kiss
lesson_3.Info: Sometimes you have to ask for it...
lesson_3.Memo:
Another phrase is:
"Daj mi pusu" = "Give me a kiss"

lesson_4.Title: Expressing affection
lesson_4.Info: To express your feelings you can say...
lesson_4.Memo: This phrase he would say to her. She would say: "Zaljubljena sam u tebe!"

lesson_5.Title: Expressing sympathy
lesson_5.Memo: The question would be "Da li ti se sviđam?" = "Do you like me?"

lesson_6.Title: Expressing love
lesson_6.Info: When your feelings are deeper you would say...

lesson_8.Title: Expressing missing
lesson_8.Info: When your love is far away...
lesson_8.Memo: Another common phrase of the same meaning is "Fališ mi!"

lesson_9.Title: Expressing enchantment
lesson_9.Memo:
This phrase is usually given to a woman. To give a compliment to a man you could say:
"Zgodan si" - "You are handsome" or
"Dobro izgledaš" - "You're looking good".

lesson_10.Title: Asking for a relationship status
lesson_10.Info: To ask for a relationship status...
lesson_10.Memo:
"Jesi li sam? / Jesi li sama?" - "Are you alone?"
"Jesi li s nekime?" - "Are you with someone?"

lesson_11.Title: Asking out
lesson_11.Translation: Do you want to go out with me?
lesson_11.Memo:
"Izlaz" = "Exit"
"Izaći" = "To come out" (in general)
"Izaći" = "To go out" (to party)
"Izlazak" = "A date, hanging with friends, being out"

lesson_12.Title: Asking to marry
lesson_12.Phrase: Hoćeš li se udati za mene?
lesson_12.Info: To ask her to marry you...
lesson_12.Memo:
"Ona se udaje" = "She is getting married"
"On se ženi" = "He is getting married"
"Ona je udana" = "She is married"
"On je oženjen" = "He is married" (literally: he is womened)

lesson_13.Title: Wedding
lesson_13.Memo: Another word for wedding is "pir". All the people at a wedding we call "svatovi".
